description:
With this badge, you show that you participated in the 2nd giveaway of the Syborgs OG Collection: The Dawn of Syborgs. 

Note that this badge is not required to enter the draw! Make sure to follow all the directions on Twitter (follow, retweet, like) because the draw will happen there. I will then contact the winner to get their Soonaverse handle.
The actual airdrop to the winner will happen when the feature is available in the Soonaverse.

600 people can own one of these badges, and there will be 2 winners in this draw! Even if you don't win, if we were you we'd try to collect as much XP as possible. Probably nothing.
name: 2nd Syborgs OG Collection airdrop
